dynamic_line: So, what can I do for you?

responses.text: I noticed your robes are decorated. What do you do?
What is your opinion upon this place?

dynamic_line: Well, I joined, advanced to the position of Homage, and learned the rites and rituals. I have not decided, actually.
Oh, I am a Homage, you see. We are resonpisble for leading most of the cult in ritual sacrifice to the Elder Ones. The Onocti aid me, preparing the altar and whatnot.

responses.text: With your position, is there anything I can do for you?

dynamic_line: Yes. We sacrifice the butchered remains of animals in exchange for The Blood, a magical substance gifted to us by the Elder Ones as reward.
The Elder Ones are our patrons. They gifted our founder with otherworldly knowledge, contained within a tome. They spread such unto us.
The Archaesth. It contains all knowledge of the breathren. Perhaps you should speak to the Lorevessel, they should be within the Hall of Artifacts, you can't miss it.
